channel.title: Portfolios on We R the World!!
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on We R the World!!

item.title: Aakarsh Shetty
item.description: I am Aakarsh Shetty !! These are my favourite graphs in R!

item.title: Adit Maheshwari
item.description: Hi! I am Adit Joshi from Pune. I am going to show the different “visualizations” that I made throughout this course

item.title: Harsh Sinha
item.description: Oh my what a rollercoaster were these 2 weeks were, lots of suffering and internal pain, the course made me actually realise what silent tears were. But the funny part is that i think these 2 weeks were the best weeks i have had at srishti.

item.title: AL KARTHIKEYAN
item.description: I’m Al Karthikeyan, and as make your way down this page, you can see all the checkpoints I crossed as I journeyed my way down the path of most Resistance. You’ll possibly also find my blood, sweat and several hundred bottles of tears.

item.title: Arunima Sajith
item.description: Hi! I am Arunima Sajith. I’m someone who had never even thought to learn coding before this class. And within two weeks of this workshop I think I’ve grown significantly. These are some of my favorite pieces of work I’ve made during this time period.

item.title: ARYA KUMAR
item.description: Hiiiiiiiii!!!! I am Arya Kumar Chandrasekaran and I live in Yelahanka. My major is DMA!!!

item.description: Hello, I’m Gayatri Jadhav from Pune. My major is CAC and this is my Data exploration journey through R.
